title: Who is Jennifer Lawrence's husband Cooke Maroney?
text:
The newlyweds (Picture: Rex Features)

Looks like the odds were in the favour of Hunger Games star Jennifer Lawrence this weekend as she walked down the aisle.

The Oscar winner married Cooke Maroney in a star-studded event with guests including Adele and Kris Jenner.

But just who is J-Law’s new husband, what does he do for a living and how long has he been with the Oscar-winning actress?

Here’s what you need to know about Cooke…

Who is Cooke Maroney?

He might forever be known as ‘Jennifer Lawrence’s husband Cooke Maroney’ from this point on, but before he was Mr. J Law, Maroney was a success in his own right.

He’s currently the director of Gladstone 64, the Gladstone art Gallery Upper East Side location.

For those who know New York society – or have ever watched Gossip Girl – that’s where the richest of the rich live and shop.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He gets his artistic flair from his father, who was a wealthy art dealer in Manhattan.

What is Cooke Maroney’s net worth and how did he get it?

Jennifer Lawrence might have starred in the Hunger Games, but she won’t be going hungry if she decides to give up the day job.

Cooke (far left) has always rubbed shoulders with society’s rich and famous, including Paris Hilton’s ex Stavros Niarchos (middle) (Picture: Getty images)

Maroney is reportedly worth a mighty $25m (£19.2m).

His rumoured net worth comes from his trendy, high-end gallery which represents the likes of Anish Kapoor and Caroll Dunham, father to Girls actress Lena Dunham.

When did Jennifer Lawrence and Cooke Maroney start dating?

The pair were reported to have met back in May 2018.

They were set up by a close friend of Jennifer’s and made their first public outing back in June 2018.

The pair got married this weekend in a glitzy ceremony (Picture: Backgrid)

They confirmed their engagement in February 2019.

Jennifer said on the podcast NAKED: ‘He’s my best friend so I want to legally bind him to me forever. And fortunately the paperwork exists for such a thing. It’s the greatest. You find your favourite person in the planet and you’re like, ‘you can’t leave.’ So I wanted to take that offer.’

MORE: Jennifer Lawrence marries Cooke Maroney in front of a-list guests Adele, Cameron Diaz and Amy Schumer

MORE: Jennifer Lawrence and fiance Cooke Maroney host clambake rehearsal dinner for 140 guests, including Kris Jenner and Adele
description: Jennifer Lawrence married Cooke Maroney this weekend in a star-studded ceremony. Who is her new husband and what does he do?
